videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's steal sets up a dunk for Aaron Wiggins.

videos.headline: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's steal sets up Aaron Wiggins' dunk

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander makes a sweet pass to set up a bucket for the Thunder.

videos.headline: Gilgeous-Alexander makes a sweet pass to set up a Thunder bucket

videos.description: Dejounte Murray finishes with 23 points, 14 assists and 10 rebounds as the Spurs defeat the Thunder 118-96.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Oklahoma City Thunder vs. San Antonio Spurs: Full Highlights) 2022/01/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dejounte Murray logs triple-double as Spurs cruise past Thunder
